ai-tha-ap107:0.3_0: Hearing this flower, the senior monks in charge of building work.
ai-tha-ap107:1.4_0: the world’s Elder, and the world does not clever.
ai-tha-ap107:2.1_0: Taking a flower from its flowers,
ai-tha-ap107:2.2_0: the supreme state of sublime Dhamma,
ai-tha-ap107:3.4_0: that leads to a bad place.
ai-tha-ap107:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap107:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Muttā.
